title: Need to Know: Time for Europe to glitter and lift stocks worldwide
content:
Investors look poised to spend much of the day interpreting the latest gems from the European Central Bank. Also in focus are Europe’s migrant crisis, Tesla’s next car and whether investors should be buying the dip again.
